mention.text: Some of the police officers who stood by while others beat black motorist Rodney King maintain `` to this day '' that his traffic stop was handled properly , District Attorney Ira Reiner said Friday. ; The revelation came in Reiner 's announcement that the county 's grand jury had decided not to indict the bystanders because no state laws
this day '' that his traffic stop was handled properly
the case to the U.S. attorney for review
Mark Ridley-Thomas , a city council candidate and executive director of this area 's chapter of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference
a city council candidate and executive director of this area 's chapter of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference
five rookies who witnessed King 's arrest
one of the officers , a rookie
The police department 's internal investigation of its bystanders
